item.title: Getting started with data-mining
item.description: Related topics to data mining # Data mining is a wide topic, and the term is (unfortunately) very liberally thrown at any topic that involves data processing. Because of this this “documentation” should never have been created in the first place, because it overlaps with other topcis too much, and everything is better discussed elsewhere. And of course, this is not a programming language, or API. Because of overlap with other topics, distinguish data-mining from:
